title: Barack Obama and the Predictable Coup
description:
Photo Credit:Image: NASA Goddard Space Flight Center via Flickr, CC BY 2.0 (cropped).

 
 NASA Goddard Space Flight CenterSome people just can’t believe that Obama could do the things he’s accused of. But for those who know him, it’s undeniable.
